name: SLIME ARENA (serci98)
description:
Welcome to 

================SLIME=ARENA=============

Destroy all the slimes and the boss for exit to the arena.

____________________Story___________________

In tihs world lived two species: humans and slimes, wich lived happily, but a Giant Slime hate the humans and, so, he constricted them to fight an army of slimes in an Arena, the Slime Arena! But a wizard wanted to use all his magical powers for destroy the Giant Slime. 

_________________Instruction__________________

Arrow keys to move

Space to shoot enchants

When you take an item press 1,2...9 for select it in the items bar and then press E for active it

__________________Items_____________________

Light blue projectile: you can shoot faster

Shield: you can't lose life for a bit of time

Shoes: you move faster
